mapper.select: select * from reserveFac where fac_name = #{fac_name} and fac_aptname = #{fac_aptname} and reserve_date = #{reserve_date}
mapper.insert: insert into reserveFac (fac_name, fac_aptname, userId, start_time, finish_time, reserve_date) values (#{fac_name},#{fac_aptname},#{userId}, #{start_time}, #{finish_time}, #{reserve_date})
mapper.delete: delete from reserveFac where fac_name = #{fac_name} and fac_aptname = #{fac_aptname} and userId = #{userId}
